Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
divs: Sighting DetailsLast night my wife and I went outside in our back yard to see if there was a chance we could see the northern lights that the news had been talking about. I know I have made a lot of reports to MUFON since the 4th of July but we keep see these objects flying over our house. At 9pm I saw a light moving thru the tree in our front yard and as it came into view at the top of the tree I saw it was the same orangish hot metal looking object that we have seen in the past (4 on July 4th and 2 on July 23rd and maybe 6 from a differant view point on the 30th of July). I told my wife look there is another one. The object was about 500ft up coming from the west heading east.It looked to be about the size of a suv. As it came over the house this time it slowed and almost came to a stop. It then went stright up and got dimmer as it went up. It looked like it went up about 500 to 800 ft higher than it was. Again we could see a kind of see thru glowing grey sphere around the object and what looked like a disc shape inside. It then started moving east again and we watched it until we could not see it anymore. I took photo but I can not keep camera still so all you see is zig zag lines of light. I will keep trying when and if we see more. I don't know if this means anything but I felt fine before the sighting but right after sighting I had a need to go to the bathroom real fast and my stomach was knoted up for about a half hour after then I was fine my wife had no problems. We do not know what these things are or what they are doing but we seem to be seeing a lot of them. They do not seem to be of this world.
Summary: 1 object same as earlier reports low over house.
trends: There have been 25 other sightings in Stockton
There was one other sighting in Stockton on or around August 3rd 2010
This sighting has never been favorited.
